forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 33F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this evening will become intermittent overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with a few snow showers in the evening. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the evening. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 19F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny early then becoming mostly cloudy with snow showers developing later in the day. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional snow showers in the afternoon. High 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 19F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the day. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the day. High 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low near 20F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low around 15F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 22F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 14F. Winds light and variable.
